name: Regions (Bshow)
description:
Currently Second Update. Check the last devBlog.

Regions is a simple game I am developing for a school project. It is still under heavy development and the gameplay is pretty simple  but I would like to have some feedback. Feel free to let me know what you would add or change in the interface and gameplay.

CREDITS
